intension: Promote new organic soaps for sale on @soupond's Instagram story.
globalcaption: The image features a table with a variety of soap bars displayed on it. keywords: soap, organic, care, natural, wellness, beauty, health, cosmetic, healthy, hygiene, homemade, bath, aroma, spa, aromatherapy, bars, cosmetics, fresh, sale, story, instagram, ig, insta
